awd_titl_txt: Local Atomic Structure of Non-Periodic Solids
awd_abstract_narration: This program explores the defect structure of quasicrystals,                    superconducting oxides, and amorphous alloys using the technique                of atomic pair distribution function analysis (PDF).  The PDF                   method has been employed primarily for amorphous solids and                     liquids and is now being used in the examination of non-periodic                atomic displacements in more ordered solids.  The PDF method is                 refined further in this research, which examines the statistical                noise, lattice dynamics, and techniques for improved accuracy in                the differential anomalous x-ray scattering experiments.  The                   main focus of the grant is on developing understanding of defect                structure in the above materials, which have high incidence of                  atoms which deviate in position from their average sites.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences

inst.org_lgl_bus_name: TRUSTEES OF THE UNIVERSITY OF PENNSYLVANIA, THE
